snippet: A small-scale replica of a World War II concentration camp erected in Prague commemorates the assassination of the notorious Nazi general Reinhard Heydrich and celebrates those who were part of the resistance movement.
abstract: A small-scale replica of a World War II concentration camp erected in Prague commemorates the assassination of the notorious Nazi general Reinhard Heydrich and celebrates those who were part of the resistance movement.

headline.main: In Prague, Revisiting an Assassination and the Resistance Movement
